definitions.definition: The branch of pathology that deals with abnormalities of cells , independently of the tissue architecture from which they came, as for example in aspiration biopsy such as fine-needle aspiration .

main_definition: ( cytology , pathology ) The branch of pathology that deals with abnormalities of cells , independently of the tissue architecture from which they came, as for example in aspiration biopsy such as fine-needle aspiration .
